title: r/Askreddit What's The Creepiest Thing You've Seen While Working At A Remote Location?
description: r/Askreddit In today's episode, we have stories of creepy encounters that people have had while working in scary, remote locations. Ever wonder what it's like to work on at an oil rig when the nearest human is dozens of miles away? And why did OP and his naval buddies encounter bizarre floating lights in the night sky? If you like this video, subscribe for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
